name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, in a temple in Nanjing, a woman questioned why there were words from other countries on the temple sign.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, a fire broke out at Jiamusi Sanjiang International

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 23, a video of a "985 graduate student dropping out of school and lying down at home" sparked heated discussion among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, in a community in Changzhou, residents discovered that there was no water in the fire hydrant after a fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, a man drove a Bentley and stopped a passing BMW on the Hangzhou viaduct. He then got out of the car, dragged the BMW owner out, and stabbed him several times in the thigh and body with a folding knife. After he fell to the ground, he took the BMW owner's mobile phone, got into the BMW and took the driving recorder, and finally drove away. The video was immediately blocked in China, but now, angry netizens across the country have been forwarding it overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Thanks to the efforts of all netizens throughout the night, the incident has become a hot topic, and the police responded that the suspect has been arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Emergency Notice
Currently, the Ministry of Public Security is checking my 1.6 million followers and comment area one by one. Once the identity is confirmed, the local police will be notified to call the person for questioning. Therefore, all friends in China please read the following notes:
1. Ordinary people: I suggest that all those who are afraid just unfollow me, collect one of my tweets, or search my name to check the news of the day. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yes, I also think it is incredible to check my followers one by one, but I have found that it is true in recent days. They are indeed using the most primitive method. It doesn’t matter whether you believe it or not. I hope the above content will help you with your safety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @gaoyu200812 Thank you for your hard work, Mr. Gao. I salute you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of February 25, Hangzhou residents went to the gate of Wahaha Group's headquarters to mourn Zong Qinghou. Zong Qinghou, the founder and chairman of Wahaha Group, died at 10:30 a.m. on Sunday (February 25) at the age of 79 due to illness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen provided a way to follow me without being discovered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Finally, I want to add that I have been following this matter for several months.
Anyone who has had tea should know that the first thing the police ask is whether you have paid attention to me.
I don’t want to answer questions about whether you think this is true or false. I don’t need your opinion. I have a lot of data in my background to verify the severity of the matter. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 24, Shaanxi Weinan High-tech Zone Gaoxin Primary School required parents to sign a document promising not to let their children attend tutoring on weekends. However, the attachment also provided a whitelist of off-campus training institutions that can provide tutoring.
